name: Tyrusb.github.io
body:
## Ty Brooks

Hi, I'm Ty, a web developer here in the San Francisco Bay Area focusing on Ruby/Rails and Javascript/Backbone.

## Portfolio

Take a look at some of my recent projects. You can find my github [here.](https://github.com/tyrusb)

### Chef Genius

![Chef Genius annotation feature](https://github.com/TyrusB/TyrusB.github.io/blob/master/ChefGenius.png)

_Rails, Backbone_
A clone of the popular site Rap Genius, my version allows the submission and annotation of cooking recipes, and commenting on those annotations.
* Uses native JS to traverse and interact with the DOM on the node and element level.
* Polymorphic associations and concerns on the Rails backend.
* Uses event aggregator for communication between views.
* Bootstraps initial data.

### Cosmic Drift

![Spaceship shootin' asteroids.](https://github.com/TyrusB/TyrusB.github.io/blob/master/CosmicDrift.png)

_Javascript, HTML5 Canvas_
Asteroids! Spaceships! Exciting interstellar action with movement reminiscent of the classic arcade game Asteroids.
* Uses trig to calculate direction of movement and rotate ship.
* Custom-shaped asteroids.
* Advanced keybinding, with a cooldown for some actions, and continuous registration for others.

### Node Chat

![An image of the NodeChat chatroom](https://github.com/TyrusB/TyrusB.github.io/blob/master/NodeChat.png)

_Node.js, socket.io_
Chatroom application built on a node backend that uses websockets for multi-client communication.
* Supports custom usernames for users
* Notifies users upon user entering or exiting chatroom.
* Smart notification system ensures all users have up-to-date user list.

### Tyrello

![A demonstration of Tyrello's draggable cards.](https://github.com/TyrusB/TyrusB.github.io/blob/master/Tyrello.png)

_Backbone, Rails_
A clone of the website Trello. Users create boards, boards have lists, lists have cards. Cards and lists are both draggable and dropable.
* Implements dragging and dropping using jQuery UI.
* Uses HTML5 data attributes to persist changes to card/list order through drag and drop.
* Uses jBuilder to customize data returned from API.

### ActiveWreckered

![Screenshot of code.](https://github.com/TyrusB/TyrusB.github.io/blob/master/ActiveWreckered.png)

_Ruby_
A lite replication of Rails' ActiveRecord ORM features. Implements database persistence, mass assignment (soo Rails 3), querying, and associational methods.
* Features heavy use of Ruby metaprogramming.
* Uses several advanced raw SQL queries, with escaping to prevent injection attacks.

### Tracks

![Screenshot of code.](https://github.com/TyrusB/TyrusB.github.io/blob/master/Tracks.png)

_Ruby_
Replicates Rails functionality, particularly the VC in Rails' MVC.
* Supports Rails-style nested params, as well as query strings and route params.
* Routes server request to the appropriate controller/action.
* Controllers use binding to render ERB
* Stores flash and session info in browser cookies.

## Resume

You can download a copy of my [resume](https://github.com/TyrusB/TyrusB.github.io/blob/master/TyBrooksResume.pdf), or take a look below. A lot of my prior experience was in education, but I think the ability to quickly grasp and be able to articulate complex information will be helpful in other contexts as well.

### Work Experience

**Regional Director**  _Administration, Sales, Marketing_       August 2011 â€“ July 2013
Catalyst Prep,     San Francisco Bay Area, CA                 
*  Doubled size/revenue of region: coordinated 115 prep classes with $500,000 of revenue generated.
*  Part of leadership team in an education startup environment during period of exponential company growth.
*  Analyzed data from education databases to better target potential partner schools. 
*  Mentored new directors, helped manage tutors, and assisted management in forming company strategy.
 
**LSAT Instructor**  _Education_                      June 2011 - Present (part-time)
PowerScore,  San Jose, CA  	
*  Managed classrooms of up to 40 students. Positive feedback available upon request.
*  Responsible for creating lesson plans to augment standardized curriculum.
*  Condensed/articulated complex logical ideas into comprehensible parts.
*  99th percentile score on LSAT (a logic-based test).

## Contact

Feel free to shoot me and email at [brooks85.ty@gmail.com](mailto:brooks85.ty@gmail.com). Thanks for reading!
